title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
Pre-requisite: EC21005 Introduction to signals and systems; Review of Fourier and Laplace Transforms; LTI system: Causality, stability, region of convergence; Classification and representation of signals, Concepts of linear vector space and orthogonal signal representation; Discrete signals: Sampling, digitization and reconstruction of analog signals; Fourier transform of discrete signals: z-transforms; Discrete systems, transfer functions and convolution; Laplace transform, first
order and second order systems

title: How to Crack the Paper
text:
Study and solve problems and tutorials. Rest depends on how professor is doing course. Make strategy accordingly.
Study it properly as it forms basis for Analog and Digital Communication and DSP in 3rd year.
